DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if performing ultrasound with an attachment made up of two transducers will give us more information about the blood vessels in the breast than the current attachment that has only one transducer and to decide if using an ultrasound agent which enhances the ultrasound signal will help see smaller blood vessels than can be seen without the agent.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluate Breast Masses Using a New Method of Ultrasound Contrast to Detect Abnormal Blood Flow in Breasts
DOC.criteria: Female subjects who have breast masses and scheduled for core biopsy. Pregnant or lactating females. Females who have heart problems or sensitivity to contrast agents. Females who have had previous surgery for breast cancer.
